pkgmetadata.longdescription: Output Space-Filling Design // Methods to generate a design in the input space that sequentially fills the output space of a black-box function. The output space-filling designs are helpful in inverse design or feature-based modeling problems. See Wang, Shangkun, Adam P. Generale, Surya R. Kalidindi, and V. Roshan Joseph. (2024), Sequential designs for filling output spaces, Technometrics, 66, 6576. for details. This work is supported by U.S. National Foundation grant CMMI-1921646.
